channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
item.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

item.title: I want to gift my grandnieces, ages 5 and 10, stocks. How do I make sure they get an equal amount when they turn 18?
item.description: “One child’s portfolio will have an additional five years of growth.”

item.title: Mysterious UFO at Jeff Bezos’ $165 million Beverly Hills home is probably just a sauna
item.description: Amazon billionaire Jeff Bezos and wife Lauren Sanchez have added an out-of-this-world element to their Beverly Hills mansion: a silver structure that ...

item.title: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
item.description: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

item.title: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: Wall Street wrote off Palantir as too expensive. Retail investors can't get enough
item.description: The stock, which made its market debut in 2020, is an indisputable star of the retail investing world.

item.title: This discount retailer thrived in 2025 despite a volatile backdrop. Why that momentum can continue in 2026
item.description: The company hit an all-time high earlier in December, and the stock is up more than 19% — outpacing the S&P 500's 17% advance.

item.title: The blowout AI trades that surprised Wall Street in 2025
item.description: We lay out the AI trades that captured the market's attention, from Google's unexpected growth to the boom in rocket companies and self-driving cars.

item.title: A rotation into value stocks from growth could grow stronger in the new year
item.description: Value stocks have enjoyed a late-year resurgence, after underperforming earlier in 2025.

item.title: This convenience store chain is in a long-term upward trend with no signs of slowing, charts show
item.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down the charts on this convenience store stock ahead of 2026.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade
item.description: Meta description: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock rockets 37% on KeyBanc overweight rating and $20 target amid lunar contract potential. Discover risk...

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial
item.description: DBVT stock surges as much as 46% on positive Phase 3 results for Viaskin Peanut patch, a potential breakthrough treatment for peanut allergies in youn...

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
